resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."

Guidelines for Assignment

Follow the following rules while filling up the assignment data:
  1. In the first page of the assignment you have to enter the center code.i.e last 6 digit of the centre code ex-if centre code is 19328270101 then write "270101"
  2. Then click on the radio button beside it,check the centre name and other details before moving on to the next page.
  3. In the next page ,if AWC building doesnot exists select option No and click on the two checkboxes and click on Data Save button.
  4. If AWC building exists but closed, then choose the Closed button in the second option.Surely click the two square boxes and Data Save button before submitting the data.
  5. After clicking on Upload latitude and longitude option,please waite until the latitude and longitude is shown and then click on upload address option
  6. If AWC building exists and it is open then continue to fill the other field with accurate values.
    1. Provide total number of Supplementary Nutrition Programme(SNP) Beneficiaries for 1 Month.
    2. Provide number of Beneficiaries Served With SNP for 1 month.
    3. Total number of children(7months to 6years)
    4. Number of children served with morning snacks (7months to 6years)
    5. Total number of Children(3years to 6years)
    6. Number of Children present in (PSE)Pre-School Education (3years to 6years)
    7. Number of Registers found during visit for assessment
    8. Number of Mothers meeting conducted during last month
    9. Number of children(below 5years) weighed last month
    10. Total number of children(below 5years) last month
    11. Number of malnourished children(below 5years) during last month(Moderate)
    12. Number of malnourished children(below 5years) during last month(Severe)
    13. Whether ECCE(Early Childhood Care and Education) Curriculam is followed
  7. Click on next Button to move on to the next page.
  8. In the last page,click on the round box to insert image through camera or from phone internal memory.Surely click on the two boxes and then on submit button to submit the data
